headline: Lina Ben Mhenni, 36; Confronted an Oppressive Regime as ‘a Tunisian Girl’
abstract: Ms. Ben Mhenni used her blog to expose violence against protesters in the revolt that led to the government’s overthrow, and then to the Arab Spring.
lead_paragraph: TUNIS — Lina Ben Mhenni, an activist blogger who bore witness to the 2010-11 popular uprising in Tunisia and the violent reaction of the country’s autocratic regime, a clash that heralded the chain of revolts known as the Arab Spring, died on Monday in Tunis. She was 36.
keywords: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
